=== x.x.x / 2008-xx-xx

r224
* user.profile_main_fbml sets the profile_main for the left side of main pages on the new profile [dnite]
* added facebook_session.set_fbml. Takes hash of items you wish to set. :uid must be included. [dnite]

r223
* Added profile.setInfoOptions and profile.getInfoOptions [dnite]
* Added view helper for <fb:add-section-button /> [dnite]

r222
* Added option in Facebooker.yml for using api.new.facebook.com (just add api: new) [dnite]
* Added profile.setInfo and profile.getInfo [dnite]
* facebook_session.user.profile_info returns an InfoSection object with an array of 
  InfoField objects with an array of InfoItem objects [dnite]

r221
* fixed typo in set app properties parser [Andrew Grim, shane]
* Removed actor_id param from templatized feed [shane]
* Added admin.get_allocation [shane]
* Added data.get_cookies and data.set_cookie [shane]
* Added admin.get_app_properties and admin.set_app_properties [shane]

=== 0.9.5 / 2008-02-13

* Next release of documentation
